text: Johnstown is an unincorporated community in Bates County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Johnstown was established in 1856, and remained in operation until 1916. A share of the first settlers having the first name John caused the name Johnstown to be selected. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Bates County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Johnstown, Missouri
